headline: MGM Withdraws Application for Full-Fledged Yonkers, N.Y., Casino
summary: The company will no longer turn its Yonkers location into a casino with live games like poker and blackjack due to shifting competitive and economic factors, it said.

raw.headline: MGM Withdraws Application for Full-Fledged Yonkers, N.Y., Casino
raw.summary: The company will no longer turn its Yonkers location into a casino with live games like poker and blackjack due to shifting competitive and economic factors, it said.

headline: MGM Resorts (MGM) Stock Trades Up, Here Is Why
summary: Shares of hospitality and casino entertainment company MGM Resorts (NYSE:MGM) jumped 3.8% in the afternoon session after its BetMGM joint venture reported strong third-quarter results and raised its full-year guidance.

raw.headline: MGM Resorts (MGM) Stock Trades Up, Here Is Why
raw.summary: Shares of hospitality and casino entertainment company MGM Resorts (NYSE:MGM) jumped 3.8% in the afternoon session after its BetMGM joint venture reported strong third-quarter results and raised its full-year guidance.

headline: The Market Selloff That Wasn’t
summary: The three major stock market indexes were all in the red as of late Tuesday morning.  The S&P 500, a market-cap weighted index, was down about 0.5%, dragged lower by losses in megacap techs (and artificial intelligence darlings) such as Nvidia, Oracle, Broadcom and Arista Networks.  Wells Fargo was a top gainer in the index following solid earnings. Ditto for Domino’s Pizza, a recent Barron’s stock pick. Casino stocks MGM Resorts, Las Vegas Sands and Wynn Resorts were rallying too, as were Airbnb and retailers Walmart and Dollar Tree.

headline: BetMGM Lifts Full-Year Guidance After Strong Growth in IGaming, Online Sports
summary: BetMGM lifted its full-year earnings guidance after it reported a strong third-quarter performance boosted by growth in its iGaming and online sports divisions.  The sports-betting company—co-owned by  MGM Resorts International  and Entain—now expects net revenue of at least $2.75 billion and earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation, and amortization of around $200 million.  BetMGM said its so-called contribution from operations—a metric that deducts cost of revenue and marketing-acquisition spending from net revenue—is still expected to exceed $500 million.

BetMGM said its so-called contribution from operations—a metric that deducts cost of revenue and marketing-acquisition spending from net revenue—is still expected to exceed $500 million.

headline: Evaluating MGM Resorts (MGM) Valuation Following Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: MGM Resorts International (MGM) shares have edged up slightly today, continuing a pattern of modest moves seen throughout the past month. Investors seem to be weighing recent performance along with the company’s ongoing positioning in the travel and leisure market. See our latest analysis for MGM Resorts International. MGM Resorts International’s share price has retreated around 16% over the past three months, with a one-year total shareholder return of -21.6%. This reflects fading momentum...
